verses.verse: שִׁ֖יר <S%H7892><s%> shir A Song מִזְמ֣וֹר <S%H4210><s%> miz-Mor [or] Psalm לְאָסָֽף׃ <S%H623><s%> le-'a-Saf. of Asaph אֱלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him O God אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not דֳּמִי־ <S%H1824><s%> do-mi- Keep not thou silence לָ֑ךְ Lach; אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תֶּחֱרַ֖שׁ <S%H2790><s%> te-che-Rash hold not thy peace וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> ve-'al- not תִּשְׁקֹ֣ט <S%H8252><s%> tish-Kot and be not still אֵֽל׃ <S%H410><s%> 'El. O God

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- For הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh behold א֭וֹיְבֶיךָ <S%H341><s%> oy-vei-cha For lo thine enemies יֶהֱמָי֑וּן <S%H1993><s%> ye-he-ma-Yun; make a tumult וּ֝מְשַׂנְאֶ֗יךָ <S%H8130><s%> u-me-san-'Ei-cha, and they that hate נָ֣שְׂאוּ <S%H5375><s%> Na-se-'u thee have lifted up רֹֽאשׁ׃ <S%H7218><s%> Rosh. the head

עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against עַ֭מְּךָ <S%H5971><s%> 'Am-me-cha against thy people יַעֲרִ֣ימוּ <S%H6191><s%> ya-'a-Ri-mu They have taken crafty ס֑וֹד <S%H5475><s%> Sod; counsel וְ֝יִתְיָעֲצ֗וּ <S%H3289><s%> ve-yit-ya-'a-Tzu, and consulted עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against צְפוּנֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H6845><s%> tze-fu-Nei-cha. against thy hidden ones

אָמְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> 'a-me-Ru, They have said לְ֭כוּ <S%H1980><s%> Le-chu Come וְנַכְחִידֵ֣ם <S%H3582><s%> ve-nach-chi-Dem and let us cut them off מִגּ֑וֹי <S%H1471><s%> mig-Goy; from [being] a nation וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- no יִזָּכֵ֖ר <S%H2142><s%> yiz-za-Cher may be no more in remembrance שֵֽׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> shem- that the name יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel עֽוֹד׃ <S%H5750><s%> od. more

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for נוֹעֲצ֣וּ <S%H3289><s%> no-'a-Tzu For they have consulted לֵ֣ב <S%H3820><s%> lev with one consent יַחְדָּ֑ו <S%H3162><s%> yach-Dav; together עָ֝לֶ֗יךָ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-cha, Against בְּרִ֣ית <S%H1285><s%> be-Rit confederate יִכְרֹֽתוּ׃ <S%H3772><s%> yich-Ro-tu. they are

אָהֳלֵ֣י <S%H168><s%> 'o-ho-Lei The tabernacles אֱ֭דוֹם <S%H123><s%> 'E-dom of Edom וְיִשְׁמְעֵאלִ֗ים <S%H3459><s%> ve-yish-me-'e-Lim, and the Ishmaelites מוֹאָ֥ב <S%H4124><s%> mo-'Av of Moab וְהַגְרִֽים׃ <S%H1905><s%> ve-hag-Rim. and the Hagarenes

גְּבָ֣ל <S%H1381><s%> ge-Val Gebal וְ֭עַמּוֹן <S%H5983><s%> Ve-'am-mon and Ammon וַעֲמָלֵ֑ק <S%H6002><s%> va-'a-ma-Lek; and Amalek פְּ֝לֶ֗שֶׁת <S%H6429><s%> pe-Le-shet, the Philistines עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with יֹ֥שְׁבֵי <S%H3427><s%> Yo-she-vei with the inhabitants צֽוֹר׃ <S%H6865><s%> Tzor. of Tyre

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- also אַ֭שּׁוּר <S%H804><s%> 'Ash-shur Assur נִלְוָ֣ה <S%H3867><s%> nil-Vah also is joined עִמָּ֑ם <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Mam; They הָ֤י֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yu have זְר֖וֹעַ <S%H2220><s%> ze-Ro-a' with them they have holpen לִבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> liv-nei- the children ל֣וֹט <S%H3876><s%> Lot of Lot סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. Selah

עֲשֵֽׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-seh- Do לָהֶ֥ם <S%H1992><s%> la-Hem with כְּמִדְיָ֑ן <S%H4080><s%> ke-mid-Yan; unto them as [unto] the Midianites כְּֽסִֽיסְרָ֥א <S%H5516><s%> ke-si-se-Ra as [to] Sisera כְ֝יָבִ֗ין <S%H2985><s%> che-ya-Vin, as [to] Jabin בְּנַ֣חַל <S%H5158><s%> be-Na-chal at the brook קִישֽׁוֹן׃ <S%H7028><s%> ki-Shon. of Kison

נִשְׁמְד֥וּ <S%H8045><s%> nish-me-Du [Which] perished בְֽעֵין־ ve-'ein- דֹּ֑אר <S%H5874><s%> Dor; at Endor הָ֥יוּ <S%H1961><s%> Ha-yu became דֹּ֝֗מֶן <S%H1828><s%> Do-men, they became [as] dung לָאֲדָמָֽה׃ <S%H127><s%> la-'a-da-Mah. for the earth

שִׁיתֵ֣מוֹ <S%H7896><s%> shi-Te-mov Make נְ֭דִיבֵמוֹ <S%H5081><s%> ne-di-ve-mo their nobles כְּעֹרֵ֣ב <S%H6159><s%> ke-'o-Rev like Oreb וְכִזְאֵ֑ב <S%H2062><s%> ve-chiz-'Ev; and like Zeeb וּֽכְזֶ֥בַח <S%H2078><s%> u-che-Ze-vach as Zebah וּ֝כְצַלְמֻנָּ֗ע <S%H6759><s%> u-che-tzal-mun-Na', and as Zalmunna כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all נְסִיכֵֽמוֹ׃ <S%H5257><s%> ne-si-Che-mov. yea all their princes

אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher Who אָ֭מְרוּ <S%H559><s%> 'A-me-ru Who said נִ֣ירֲשָׁה <S%H3423><s%> Ni-ra-shah in possession לָּ֑נוּ La-nu; אֵ֝֗ת <S%H853><s%> 'Et, נְא֣וֹת <S%H4999><s%> ne-'ot Let us take to ourselves the houses אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him. of God

אֱ‍ ֽלֹהַ֗י <S%H430><s%> 'elo-Hai, O my God שִׁיתֵ֥מוֹ <S%H7896><s%> shi-Te-mov make כַגַּלְגַּ֑ל <S%H1534><s%> chag-gal-Gal; them like a wheel כְּ֝קַ֗שׁ <S%H7179><s%> ke-Kash, as the stubble לִפְנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> lif-nei- before רֽוּחַ׃ <S%H7307><s%> Ru-ach. the wind

כְּאֵ֥שׁ <S%H784><s%> ke-'Esh As the fire תִּבְעַר־ <S%H1197><s%> tiv-'ar- burneth יָ֑עַר <S%H3293><s%> Ya-'ar; a wood וּ֝כְלֶהָבָ֗ה <S%H3852><s%> u-che-le-ha-Vah, and as the flame תְּלַהֵ֥ט <S%H3857><s%> te-la-Het on fire הָרִֽים׃ <S%H2022><s%> ha-Rim. the mountains

כֵּ֭ן <S%H3651><s%> ken So תִּרְדְּפֵ֣ם <S%H7291><s%> tir-de-Fem So persecute בְּסַעֲרֶ֑ךָ <S%H5591><s%> be-sa-'a-Re-cha; them with thy tempest וּבְסוּפָתְךָ֥ <S%H5492><s%> u-ve-su-fa-te-Cha with thy storm תְבַהֲלֵֽם׃ <S%H926><s%> te-va-ha-Lem. and make them afraid

מַלֵּ֣א <S%H4390><s%> mal-Le Fill פְנֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H6440><s%> fe-nei-Hem their faces קָל֑וֹן <S%H7036><s%> ka-Lon; with shame וִֽיבַקְשׁ֖וּ <S%H1245><s%> vi-vak-Shu that they may seek שִׁמְךָ֣ <S%H8034><s%> shim-Cha thy name יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. O LORD

יֵבֹ֖שׁוּ <S%H954><s%> ye-Vo-shu Let them be confounded וְיִבָּהֲל֥וּ <S%H926><s%> ve-yib-ba-ha-Lu and troubled עֲדֵי־ <S%H5703><s%> 'a-dei- for ever עַ֗ד <S%H5704><s%> 'Ad, and let וְֽיַחְפְּר֥וּ <S%H2659><s%> ve-yach-pe-Ru yea let them be put to shame וְיֹאבֵֽדוּ׃ <S%H6><s%> ve-yo-Ve-du. and perish

וְֽיֵדְע֗וּ <S%H3045><s%> ve-ye-de-'U, That [men] may know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for אַתָּ֬ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah whose שִׁמְךָ֣ <S%H8034><s%> shim-Cha that thou whose name יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh alone [is] JEHOVAH לְבַדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H905><s%> le-vad-De-cha; you alone עֶ֝לְי֗וֹן <S%H5945><s%> el-Yon, [art] the most high עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. over all the earth
